title: 01. The beginning
content: Today on the 4th of May 2024, i started creating this website because i saw a YouTube short of a guy playing Plinko.\nI thought it was cool and i wanted to make a website that could simulate the game. I started by creating a simple website with HTML and CSS.\nThe first game i made was Plinko!
author: mogens

title: 02. PLINKO!!!!
content: During the night of May 5th 2024 i kept my girlfriend awake by creating the full Plinko game. It now fully works with\n features such as auto drop, difficulty and more...
author: mogens

title: 03. Continueing the journey
content:
It is now still the middle of the night i will log off calling it a day after creating a cool website with Plinko and
a working blog page. Here i will try to update every time i create the website. Pretty good job so far! :)
I will definitely try to release this page once it is done!

NEXT UP: Mines!!!
author: mogens

title: 04 Final update for tonight :S
content:
I didnt go to sleep, BUT NOW I WILL!!! I just quickly added a slider to control the speed of the autodropper.
I will now go to sleep and continue tomorrow.

NEXT UP ACTUALLY THIS TIME: Mines!!!

 I also added these cool separators :) Now i am going my girlfriend is going to kill me if i dont go to sleep now.

Goodnight! :)
author: mogens

title: 05. Mines
content:
Got a lot of shit done on my laptop at my moms place! I have now added the minesweeper game to the website. It is now fully functional with
 mine count slider, cashout and more!

I will now go to sleep and continue tomorrow.

NEXT UP: Snake maybe or something else????
author: mogens

title: Update right before midnight and bedtime :3
content:
I just wrote the final things on the mines game and it works perfectly! wuhu! Now i will go to bed and maybe think about what the next game
should be. I am thinking that it should be either snake or another gambling game???
See ya tomorrow maybe!

 Let's gooooo! Big Win!!!
author: a very tired but happy mogens
